title: State vs Rajesh
summary: This case deals with IPC section 302 regarding murder.
judgement: The accused was found guilty under IPC 302.
full_text: In the case of State vs Rajesh, the High Court observed that there was enough evidence to convict the accused under IPC 302...

title: ABC Corp vs Govt of India
summary: Breach of contract involving a government tender.
judgement: The contract was nullified due to procedural issues.
full_text: ABC Corp filed a petition against the government for breach of contract in a public tender. The court ruled in favor of the government citing procedural lapses by the corporation.
